name: Blind Bird (itch)
description:
Blind Bird

Help Torca, the blind bird, to get back home. Just create platforms, he will be constantly moving and jumping when hits a wall that isn't taller than him.

This is a very short game done in a couple of hours, try to enjoy it.

How to play

- Click anywhere on an empty spot to create a platform.

- Click on Torca to make him change direction.

Credits

- Juan Garcia (@QuietGecko) - Audio (Music and SFX)

- Mateo 'Carenalga' Robayo (@mapedorr) - Code and Art

Extras

The background music is known as a Pasillo, and it is part of Colombians folk music.

The core mechanic for the game was taken from this post and "translated" to Phaser 3.

Antartic Adventure served us as inspiration too.

Torca is an eared dove (Zenaida auriculata).
